title: Three-layer coconut cream cake
ingredients: ['225ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '220g butter or margarine', '400g caster sugar', '5 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '75g desiccated coconut', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '250g plain flour', '225g cream cheese', '110g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '480g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons single cream', '60g chopped walnuts', '75g desiccated coconut']
